data.actual_result: The speaker which the sound comes out of being the phone call speaker, and not the normal speaker.
data.expected_result: The sound to resume coming out of the same speaker it was coming out of before.
data.short_description: Wrong speaker being used after receiving a phone call while being in a discord voice call
data.steps_to_repro: - Get in a voice call with someone. - Receive a phone call while being in a voice call. - Accept the phone call wait 2-5 seconds and close it. - Observe the sound coming from the phone call speaker, and not the normal phone speaker.
